title: Barcelona
description: In January 2023, I went to Barcelona to attend the Algorand Centres of Excellence conference.

photos.description: The Museu Nacional d'Art de Catalunya. Saw this on my way from the airport to the hotel and stopped to take some pictures. The sky is a bit blown out, unfortunately, but still pretty nice.
photos.alt: A large palace at the top of a long flight of stairs with a row of lamposts in the foreground.

photos.description: A statue at the art museum overlooking the city and Sagrada Fam√≠lia. Didn't actually get to go there on this trip.
photos.alt: A statue of a man looking out over the city with a large cathedral towering above everything.

photos.description: Some towers at the museum. I just like how they're spaced. The sky looks better here too.
Green (jade?) sheep head fountains. The stone underneath looks like brains.
photos.alt: Three fountains in the shape of sheep heads.

photos.description: A row of lamp posts. There's a bit of a things-in-a-row theme in these photos.
photos.alt: A row of lamp posts leading off into the distance.

photos.description: A lot of sailboats. The crashing wave makes it dynamic.
photos.alt: A sea with many sailboats and a rocky pier with a crashing wave.

photos.description: Very artistic windows. The square ones are very thick, wonder what it looks like from inside.
photos.alt: The side of a building with many windows of different shapes and angles.

photos.description: A castle from the old Roman part of the city. Note the mysterious lone light.
photos.alt: A brick castle with a light in one window.

photos.description: Yet another row of things, this time lanterns that I wish were a bit more in focus, but it was dark and the camera was trying its best.
photos.alt: A row of lit lanterns against a building at night.
